text: Charlie Kapp is a former German curler. He is a former European men's curling champion (), German men's curling champion (1989) and two-time German mixed curling champion (1989, 1990).Curling - Deutsche Meisterschaften His sons Andy Kapp and Uli Kapp are well-known German curlers too. ==Teams== ===Men's=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
